snippet.title: Eredan Arena - Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY 
http://www.eredan-arena.com 

BECOME THE MASTER OF THE ARENA!
You know me? I'm Amnezy! The superb arena you can see here is mine. You wonder what you're doing here? Look at the people all around: they are your new team mates. On the other side of the arena, your enemies are waiting to fight.
Will you survive?!
After the incredible success of EREDAN iTCG, FEERIK invites you to play its new collectible card game: EREDAN ARENA.
AN EASY, RICH AND STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
Choose your 5 heroes wisely and use the fighting dice system to smash up your enemies!

COLLECT HEROES AND MAKE THEM EVOLVE
Discover many Heroes who belong to different guilds with strong graphic styles. Each hero can level up and become stronger fight after fight!
PLAY AS MUCH AS YOU WANT!
You can play a couple of minutes or keep on playing for hours, it's your call, there is no limit!

Follow us on Twitter @EredanArena
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EredanArenaOfficial
